name: S.S.O.S.
description: CAPTAIN! There's no way around it: our ship is going DOWN. We're falling into a nearby planet and the enemy's still in our tail. Initiate the Starship Special Operations System! Let's evacuate and save as many lives as we can. But remember sir:, each crew member who leaves the ship is one less available specialist on board. The more lives you save, the more you're left OUT OF CONTROL!.
